title: Inflation Ghost (Propaganda).iso
description:
This short movie is a propagandafilm made by the European Central Bank. It feautures the ECB as the savior of humanity fighting the inflation ghost by charging and raising interest on money lenidng. Obviously it does NOT mention that interest is the main CAUSE of inflation, just like interest is the ONLY true cause of the current credit crisis.
